resources.string: Thanks for using Activity Calendar. If you found this app useful, share with your friends.

This is an easy to use app, with a very simple interface, it helps you organise your activities from your classes, study time, gym sessions, music lessons, coffee dates, competitions and everything in between so that you don\'t miss out on anything, making sure you\'re at the right place at the right time doing the right thing.
Are you sure you want to delete?
